template.description: This template demonstrates how the flow can take different routes dependent on what is or is not a part of the content or attributes of the flowfile
template.name: Route on Content and--or Attribute

labels.label: This processor allows some HTTP request to enter the flow with all its attributes and content

This processor allows data in the body of the FlowFile to be inserted as an attribute of the FlowFile. ------------------------------------------------------ These attributes will persist unless some processor is specifically used to delete them.
This processor allows some FlowFile to be sent back as a response
This processor allows some FlowFile to be sent back as a response
This processor allows FlowFiles to take different routes based on specified attribute(s)
This processor allows some HTTP request to enter the flow with all its attributes and content ----------------------------------------------- This processor has been set to only allow POST requets
This template demonstrates the manipulation of the route of a FlowFile based on attributes it has or content it contains

This processor enables data to be appended to, prepended to, removed from the content of a FlowFile. It can also replace data. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- All of these options are based on a regular expression used to signal what to edit or where in the content of the FlowFile to edit. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Text can also be 'hard-coded' into the FlowFile
This processor allows FlowFiles to take different routes based on specified data within the FlowFile ------------------------------------------- The data is specified using a regular expression

This processor enables data to be appended to, prepended to, removed from the content of a FlowFile. It can also replace data. --------------------------------------------------------- All of these options are based on a regular expression used to signal what to edit or where in the content of the FlowFile to edit. -------------------------------------------------------- Text can also be 'hard-coded' into the FlowFile

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

value.name: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

entry.key: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

value.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern
Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.value: All required content and attributes exist
${http.headers.startdate:isNull():append('startdate Header is missing')} ${RouteOnContent:equals('unmatched'):not():append('Invalid enddate in content')}
